name: Five Nights at Freddie's Deluxe V2
name_original: Five Nights at Freddie's Deluxe V2
description:
Five Nights at Freddie's Deluxe was originally just a joke game I made. However, after adding onto it a bit, it has turned into a much more important project. Don't let Freddie's silly design fool you, he won't let you escape easily.

Features:

  • Five main nights to play through
  • Custom Night with several challenges and a difficult all/20 mode, along with Custom Night exclusive characters
  • Monkeys. Lots of monkeys.

Credits:

  • Chester the Chimp created by Emil Macko
  • Main menu theme from Spooky's Jumpscare Mansion
  • Some Custom Night music from the BTD games
  • Other sounds obtained from other FNAF games
  • TurtleBoard (Turtle_boiz on Scratch) for playtesting game before release
  • I forgor
  • Honestly just a bunch of Google images
